title: new custom font on hp.com?
content:
Hi,

My first post to the Typophile. :-)

Does anyone know who designed the new font used on [www.hp.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150402034931/http:/www.hp.com/ "www.hp.com")?? It's named HP Simplified. I've tried searching google, bing, yahoo, etc. No luck.

Let me know.

Thanks!!!  
Joe
author: Joe Kral

comments.content:
Yes its Dalton Maag

Nice font indeed. Resembles Soho Gothic a bit

I have only seen HP Simplified in bold and regular...I wonder if there are more styles like an italic etc. ? anyone know?

Looks like there are more styles. Go to [https://h10014.www1.hp.com/hpweb/login.asp](http://web.archive.org/web/20150402034931/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fh10014.www1.hp.com/hpweb/login.asp)  
they seemingly are offering the fonts.
